title: (4281) Architect Designed Brand New 2 Storied House Available for Sale, Thalawathugoda Kalalgoda Road,
details: Architect Designed Brand New 2 Storied House Available for Sale, Thalawathugoda Kalalgoda Road, in Highly Residential Area 11 Perches Land extent, 04 Rooms, 4 Bathrooms all With Shower Cubicles, Toto fittings and Granite tops. 3 Phase electricity, Pipeline Water With overhead Tank, Hot Water- Solar Panel. 02 Pantries, Pantry Cupboards With Granite tops Remote Control Gate Parking for 2 Vehicles Servant Room and Bathrooms front and back Landscape Garden. Rs : 325 Negotiable 32.5 Million
